short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Oracle Smart View content. Supports Smart View 23.210 or later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you open Oracle EPM applications in browser from MS Office documents containing Oracle Smart View data or vice versa, you need this extension. It serves as a pass-through mechanism for sending OLAP queries and reporting data between Oracle Smart View and browsers. Oracle Smart View for Office needs to be installed on the user's machine. No configuration or direct user interaction is required.
